context_bundle.summary: PAD UI automation: Click/Populate/Select elements in Windows apps, Get element details, Focus window, Wait for UI element appear/disappear. Desktop app automation counterpart to web

onboarding.quick_start: Focus window -> Wait for UI element -> Click button -> Populate text field -> Select dropdown item -> Get element details for validation
common_patterns: Focus window 'Window Title' -> bring to foreground
Wait for UI element appear timeout:30 seconds
Click UI element in window type:LeftClick|RightClick|DoubleClick
Populate text field emulate typing:False for fast input
Select item in dropdown list by:Name|Index
Get details of UI element attribute:'Text'|'IsEnabled'|'IsVisible' -> %Value%
known_errors: UIPI blocks cross-elevation - run PAD as admin if target is elevated
Element selector broken after UI update - re-record element
Focus window fails if minimized to tray
Emulate typing:True needed for some secure text fields
